topic.title: What's it like living in China?
topic.body: I hear the economy is doing great and China is on its way to becoming a superpower. China is leading the way in A.I. research and the new Silk Road looks promising. Everything's going great right?

1525817890_17TqGZXijgnyeq8uxV7c18T3ZzhZP.body: so it's still communist or capitalist totalitarian?
so it's still communist or capitalist totalitarian?
